get.description: Result of the request to list REST API operations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply to the operation. Example: '$filter=contains(name,'myName')

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of resources to return from the operation. Example: '$top=10'

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: The ordering expression for the results, using OData notation. Example: '$orderby=name desc'
